text: Christopher Charles Wilkinson (born 1943 in Stockport, Greater Manchester) is a retired British breaststroke swimmer. ==Swimming career== He represented England in 110 yards and 220 yards breaststroke events, at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. ==Personal life== His younger sister is Diana Wilkinson. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:British male swimmers Category:male breaststroke swimmers Category:Swimmers at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Christopher Wilkinson (swimmer)
